meta.name: description
meta.content: The BLS Data Finder allows for search across all BLS time series databases.

form.name: subsform
form.div:
A to Z Index | FAQs | About BLS | Contact Us E-mail:
Subscribe Submit

div.div:
Follow Us
| What's New | Release Calendar | Blog

a.aria-label: Quarterly Census of Employment and Wages State and Country Map
Comparison Matrix of BLS compensation data sources

form.p: Data Finder's Search uses "and" as the default search operator, which will display results containing all search terms. To search for data that contains any combination of search terms, include an "or" between the terms.

div.label: Display number of results per page

li.a: Occupational injuries and illnesses industry data

div.label: Industry-level data from the Survey of Occupational Injuries and Illnesses (SOII)

input.data-title: Industry-level data from the Survey of Occupational Injuries and Illnesses (SOII)

p.a: Industry-level data from the Survey of Occupational Injuries and Illnesses (SOII)

tr.td: Industry-level data from the Survey of Occupational Injuries and Illnesses (SOII)
Occupational injuries and illnesses industry data (2014 forward)
Rate of injury and illness cases per 100 full-time workers (Size class 0)
